page.title: 13Foam Shaping and Airwheels
page.content:
The{Polyfreem}factory at Holton Heath cuts foam into all different shapes and sizes, using many colours. They stuff pillows for the people in hospital and use a machine to cut it into little pieces. 32 people work there. They have a good sewing machine. They have many colours such as blue, pink, white, grey, peach, red and black.
{Airwheels}is a company which makes the fans for fan heaters and hair dryers. When they are turned by an electric motor, the fans blow air. It is the only company in Britain which makes these fans. The company sends the fans all over the country and overseas.
